item.title: Visiting Researcher at the University of Oxford
item.description: As part of my PhD I’ve recently joined as a visiting researcher the Department of Computer Science, University of Oxford ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§. I’m going to spend around six months there, supervised by Prof. Kasper Rasmussen and co-supervised by Prof. Ivan Martinovic. I’m very excited!
